item.description:
roses are lovely and inspire much adoration. but the species you find at the florist shop is just one member of a HUGE family! come meet the rest and learn how they all relate. plus we're bound to see lots of birdies and bugs ('cause they enjoy them, too!).


ps. the photo's a pearlbush, so named for the pretty, round buds that form just before full-bloom. simply one example of the many charming stages of each plant's life-cycle (wait until you see their luscious fruits!).
item.how_to_find_us:
meet at the main gate.
my vehicle: red jeep with big wheels. and i'll be the one sniffing around for the scent of those lovely blossoms!
item.why: there'll be trees and roses! plus this urban oasis nutures abundant wildlife and serves as an excellent site for studying plants.
item.name: Arnold Arboretum....and it's fabulous rose garden!
